required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Real-world Evaluation of Brolucizumab for the Treatment of Neovascular (Wet) Age-related Macular Degeneration (AMD) (IRIS Study)
clinical_study.official_title: Real-world Evaluation of Brolucizumab for the Treatment of Neovascular (Wet) Age-related Macular Degeneration (AMD) (IRIS Study)

brief_summary.textblock: This study was a retrospective cohort study of patients to assess the early insights into real-world safety among wet AMD patients initiating brolucizumab. Evidence was generated to describe their patient characteristics and clinical outcomes. The study was conducted using the IRIS Registry.

detailed_description.textblock:
IRIS Registry EHR data from patients with wet AMD who initiated brolucizumab were analyzed in this study.
Identification period of the index date (index period): The patients fulfilling the selection criteria was identified
- Index date: Defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection
- Study Period: The period from the first patient eye exposure to brolucizumab to the last follow-up recorded
- Pre-index period: The period 36 months prior to the index date. Data within 36 months prior to the index date will be used to assess baseline characteristics.
- Post-index period: The period 180 days after the index date

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with an Intraocular Inflammation (IOI) event during the first 6 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 6 months post brolucizumab injection
primary_outcome.description: To assess IOI events observed after starting treatment with brolucizumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Age information was reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Gender information
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Gender information was reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients at various Patient Region
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Patient regions: Northeast, Midwest, South, West, Unknown

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with Insurance type
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Insurance type: Medicare, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid, Commercial, Government, Military, No Insurance, Miscellaneous, Unknown

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with Laterality of wet Age-related macular degeneration (AMD)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Laterality of wet AMD: Unilateral, Bilateral

secondary_outcome.measure: Race/Ethnicity of the participants (patient level and eye level)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Caucasian, Black or African American, Asian, Other, Unknown

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of eyes with the concurrent eye disease
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 180 days prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Types of concurrent eye diseases: ▪ Cataracts Posterior vitreous detachment Puckering of macula Macular hole Vitreomacular traction Glaucoma Amblyopia Papillitis Ischemic optic atrophy Diabetic retinopathy Diabetic macular edema Hypertensive retinopathy Pathologic myopia RAO RO RV Vitritis Endophthalmitis Uveitis Choroidal neovascularization (due to causes other than AMD, if possible, to determine) IOI

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with cataract status
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Types: phakic, pseudophakic, aphakic

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with Concomitant ocular medications
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Types: Corticosteroids Prednisone Prednisolone acetate Difluprednate Biologics Cyclosporine Methotrexate Ganciclovir Acyclovir Trifluridine Rituxan

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with the history of ocular inflammation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were reported: No history of inflammation History of any ocular inflammation History of severe ocular inflammation History of anterior inflammation History of posterior inflammation History of IOI or endophthalmitis due to infections and other underlying disease (separate category)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with prior Intraocular Inflammation (IOI) and/or prior Retinal vascular occlusion (RO)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 months prior to the index date ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Included history of ocular inflammation or occlusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with the Provider specialty
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: The following types were included: Retina specialist, General ophthalmologist, Non-retina specialist, unknown

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with the previous ocular surgeries or procedures
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months prior to the index date ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were included: Laser therapy Laser coagulation Photodynamic therapy IOP lowering surgeries (lasers, glaucoma filtering, non-filtering glaucoma) Cataract surgery Iridotomy Intraocular or refractive surgery (almost all IOP & cataract surgeries) Previous penetrating keratoplasty, vitrectomy, or ocular radiation Previous panretinal photocoagulation Previous submacular surgery, other surgical intervention or laser treatment for AMD

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of eyes treated with brolucizumab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: The following types were included: OD [eye, right], OS [eye, left], Unspecified, Unilateral, Bilateral)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with Visual Acuity (VA) reading
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection with lookback of 365 days
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were included: Snellen: 20/10, 20/12-20/20, 20/25-20/40, 20/50-20/160, ≤20/200 Approximate ETDRS letters

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with Anti-VEGF treatment-naive vs prior-treated
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Anti-VEGF treatment-naive vs prior-treated were measured at the eye level

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with the prior treatment status
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following types were included: off-label bevacizumab, ranibizumab, aflibercept, unknown, treatment-naive

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of different prior anti-VEGF agents
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were measured at the eye level: 0, 1, 2, ≥3

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of prior anti-VEGF injections
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Total, per anti-VEGF agent were measured at the eye level) Continuous Categorical: <6, 6 to <12, 12 to <24, ≥24

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of last anti-VEGF treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Total, per anti-VEGF agent; will be measured at the eye level All anti-VEGFs i. Continuous ii. Categorical: <6, 6 to <12, 12 to <24, ≥24 months Specific anti-VEGF iii. Continuous iv. Categorical: <6, 6 to <12, 12 to <24, ≥24 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Time since wet Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) diagnosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Patients were measured at the eye level

secondary_outcome.measure: Time since any Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) diagnosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Patients were measured at the eye level

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from last anti-VEGF injection to index date (among switchers)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were measured: Continuous (days) Categorical (0-30, 31-60, 61-90, 91+ days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of ocular adverse events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Post-index period defined as the 180 days following therapy initiation, excluding index date
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the incidence of ocular AEs among patients treated with brolucizumab

arm_group.description: Participants received brolucizumab injection during the index period

intervention.description: Participants received brolucizumab injection during the index period

study_pop.textblock: Patients with wet AMD who initiated brolucizumab were analyzed in this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. ≥1 Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) code (J code) or EMR note for treatment with brolucizumab during the index period (date of earliest code or EMR note = index date)
2. ≥18 years old on the index date
3. ≥1 Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) code for intravitreal administration on the index date
4. ≥1 International Classification of Diseases, Clinical Modification-9/10 (ICD-9/10) code for wet AMD in the 36 months prior to or on the index date
o Note: Off-label use of brolucizumab is not expected given payer access restrictions in the US.
5. ≥1 follow-up visit after the index date
6. ≥1 VA assessment on the index date or within 90 days prior to the index date
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Use of brolucizumab prior to 10/8/2019 (e.g. clinical trials)
2. Unknown laterality of the index eye on the index date
